title: Thought experiment: What’s one question you’d like candidates to answer at Tuesday’s debate?
text:
There’s yet another Democratic presidential debate Tuesday night, this one featuring 12 candidates: the same roster as before plus Tulsi Gabbard and Tom Steyer. We’ve already seen town halls dedicated to climate change and LGBTQ issues, so you’d think those issues would be well covered by now, but we’ll see if the moderators agree.

Andrew Donaldson asked Twitter what one question they would like the candidates asked Tuesday night — and if we could get an answer, that would be great too.

One question you would like each candidate to be asked and fully answer during tomorrow nights Democratic debate: Go. pic.twitter.com/DLEy64OgeQ — Andrew Donaldson (@four4thefire) October 14, 2019

“Tell me what you love about America.” https://t.co/TrooIyYz6Z — Jesse Kelly (@JesseKellyDC) October 15, 2019

Answer: Diversity. ***Rapturous round of applause from the audience*** — Sure that's it. (@BeoursBeours) October 15, 2019

What are you even doing here? A few people have a legit answer but 7 or 8 are wasting our time. — John Buhl (@jbuhl35) October 14, 2019

"If you could abolish the second amendment with just a signature would you do it?" — John Blackout (@ReigningBrain) October 15, 2019

How many genders are there — Boston joe (@ramadiroach) October 15, 2019

Could you please define what a 'man' and a 'woman' is and what are the differences between them? https://t.co/N47JPTTgY0 — Chad Felix Greene (@chadfelixg) October 15, 2019

What is your position on tax exempt status for churches and also the conscience protection for religious health care workers — Josh 🇭🇰 (@ncpack2010) October 14, 2019

Under what conditions would abortion be morally wrong ? — Rich Paula (@whatisacmio) October 15, 2019

What will you do on Jan 21, 2021 to solve the immigration crisis at the border? — Meg Spencer (@MegspencerMeg) October 15, 2019

Why do you think a booming economy is bad? — Jeannie Weil (@beachmumj) October 15, 2019

Besides hating trump what specific program do you wish to hang your presidency on — gymrat (@woodywil47) October 15, 2019

Why can’t the government ever spend less money this year compared to last year? — Richard Pierry (@rpierry) October 15, 2019

Why do you hate America so much that you’d want to make it like Venezuela? — Ex Pat (@dan_brewer) October 15, 2019

Which parts of the Constitution do you actually like? — D (@SB26364849932) October 15, 2019

How much of MY money should YOU be entitled to take? — MarkR (@jmrudy56) October 15, 2019

Do you support the Hong Kong protesters? — The Conservative MUA (@ConservativeMua) October 15, 2019

If you HAD to get rid of one federal department, which would it be? — dixietoo (@DiXieTwo82) October 15, 2019

"Tell me what changed between 2015 and now when Hillary and Obama both said we need to secure the border and deport illegals". — Wags (@BuyLowMakeMoney) October 15, 2019

How you planning on paying for all of your crazy socialism? — DLW_FLTRXS ⤴️ (@DLW_FLHTC) October 15, 2019

Do you believe it’s possible to have a booming economy under socialism? — 451LEO (@451LEO1) October 15, 2019

Will you accept the results of the election? — Ben (@AndStrats) October 15, 2019

What will you do to get government out of our lives and not expand government? Ask that of Republicans too. — Eric Dorsey (@EricGDorsey) October 15, 2019

Should illegal aliens be deported yes or no. And only yes or no. — TrashPanda 🇺🇸 (@TrashPa98954284) October 15, 2019

Define “assault weapon”. Thanks — Pat Trick (@patpending0000) October 15, 2019

We’d really like to hear the answer to that one ourselves.

How do they plan to overcome the guaranteed lawsuits on the overwhelming majority of the unilateral promises they are making and do they fear the SCOTUS rulings that stem from them will forever prevent Democrats from making such outlandish promises for votes again? — Steve Gill (@Steve_Gill75) October 15, 2019

If nominated, what will you say to Trump in your concession speech? — Just Clair ⚢ ♈️ (@clair4k) October 15, 2019

Why do you harbor so much hate against Republicans? — A.EinsteinPhD (@AEinsteinphd) October 15, 2019
